pkgmetadata.longdescription: Algorithms for Helping Build Dynamic TOPMODEL Implementations from Spatial Data // A set of algorithms based on Quinn et al. (1991) doi:10.1002/hyp.3360050106 for processing river network and digital elevation data to build implementations of Dynamic TOPMODEL, a semi-distributed hydrological model proposed in Beven and Freer (2001) doi:10.1002/hyp.252. The 'dynatop' package implements simulation code for Dynamic TOPMODEL based on the output of 'dynatopGIS'.
